cboCostEstimates.description: As ordered reported by the House Committee on Science, Space, and Technology on January 19, 2022
cboCostEstimates.title: H.R. 847, Promoting Digital Privacy Technologies Act

constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 21 (Thursday, February 4, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Ms. STEVENS:
H.R. 847.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8 of the Constitution of the United
States.
[Page H388]

latestAction.text: Received in the Senate and Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

title: Promoting Digital Privacy Technologies Act
